Normalization on a finite index set yields a zero coordinate.

lemma simplexProximalValue_exists_zero_coord (n : ) (gbar : Fin n ) (hn : 0 < n) (hmin : sInf ((fun i => gbar i) '' (Set.univ : Set (Fin n))) = 0) : i0, gbar i0 = 0 := by classical let S : Set := (fun i => gbar i) '' (Set.univ : Set (Fin n)) have hfin : S.Finite := (Set.finite_univ.image fun i => gbar i) have hne : S.Nonempty := by refine gbar 0, hn, ?_ exact 0, hn, by simp, rfl have hmem : (sInf S) S := Set.Nonempty.csInf_mem hne hfin have hmin' : sInf S = 0 := by simpa [S] using hmin have hmem' : (0 : ) S := by simpa [hmin'] using hmem rcases hmem' with i0, hi0, hgi0 exact i0, by simpa using hgi0

Normalization implies nonnegativity of all coordinates.

lemma simplexProximalValue_gbar_nonneg (n : ) (gbar : Fin n ) (hmin : sInf ((fun i => gbar i) '' (Set.univ : Set (Fin n))) = 0) : i, 0 gbar i := by intro i have hmem : gbar i ((fun i => gbar i) '' (Set.univ : Set (Fin n))) := by exact i, by simp, rfl have hbdd : BddBelow ((fun i => gbar i) '' (Set.univ : Set (Fin n))) := by exact (Set.finite_univ.image fun i => gbar i).bddBelow have hle : sInf ((fun i => gbar i) '' (Set.univ : Set (Fin n))) gbar i := csInf_le hbdd hmem have hmin' : sInf (Set.range fun i => gbar i) = 0 := by simpa using hmin simpa [hmin'] using hle

Shifting inside a Max.max.{u} { : Type u} [self : Max ] : max yields a positive-part expression.

lemma max_sub_eq (a b : ) : max a b - a = max (b - a) 0 := by by_cases h : a b have hb : max a b = b := max_eq_right h have hba : 0 b - a := by linarith simp [hb, hba] have h' : b a := le_of_not_ge h have hb : max a b = a := max_eq_left h' have hba : b - a 0 := by linarith have hmax : max (b - a) 0 = 0 := max_eq_right hba simp [hb, hmax]

If , the shifted Max.max.{u} { : Type u} [self : Max ] : max dominates the truncation.

lemma max_sub_ge_of_le (lam g : ) (hlam : lam ) : max lam (g - ) - lam max (g - (2 : ) * ) 0 := by have hle : g - (2 : ) * g - - lam := by linarith [hlam] have hmax : max (g - (2 : ) * ) 0 max (g - - lam) 0 := max_le_max hle le_rfl have hrewrite : max lam (g - ) - lam = max (g - - lam) 0 := by simpa [sub_eq_add_neg, add_comm, add_left_comm, add_assoc] using (max_sub_eq lam (g - )) simpa [hrewrite] using hmax
